name: Il Padronne
description: A play on the classic Negroni, this cocktail created by Patrick Reynard at Pourhouse in Vancouver, BC, is lighter in body and has subtle melon and citrus aromas.

recipeInstructions.text: Add gin, Aperol, and Cocchi Americano to a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir for 15 seconds, then strain into an ice filled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist and serve.
